title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\Resume
name: Resume
description:
Resource that represents a resume.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Resume

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.structured_resume
params.description: Users can create a profile with only this field field, if [resume_type][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Resume.resume_type] is [HRXML][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Resume.ResumeType.HRXML]. For example, the API parses this field and creates a profile with all structured fields populated. [EmploymentRecord][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmploymentRecord], [EducationRecord][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EducationRecord], and so on. An error is thrown if this field cannot be parsed. Note that the use of the functionality offered by this field to extract data from resumes is an Alpha feature and as such is not covered by any SLA.
